articles.title: RBI announces new monetary policy
articles.content: Reserve Bank of India announced interest rate changes affecting inflation and economic growth.

articles.title: India-China border talks resume
articles.content: Diplomatic talks between India and China resumed after months of standoff at LAC.

articles.title: ISRO launches new satellite
articles.content: Indian Space Research Organisation successfully launches communication satellite for rural connectivity.

articles.title: New education policy implementation
articles.content: Government announces timeline for implementing National Education Policy 2020 in all states.

articles.title: Climate change summit in Delhi
articles.content: India hosts international climate conference discussing carbon emissions and renewable energy.

articles.title: Supreme Court verdict on Article 370
articles.content: Supreme Court delivers landmark judgment on the constitutional validity of Article 370 abrogation.

articles.title: GST Council meeting decisions
articles.content: GST Council decides to reduce rates on essential items and increase compliance measures.

articles.title: India signs FTA with EFTA
articles.content: India signs Free Trade Agreement with European Free Trade Association for economic cooperation.

articles.title: Digital India initiative expansion
articles.content: Government expands Digital India initiative to cover rural broadband and digital literacy.

articles.title: Parliament passes new labor codes
articles.content: Parliament passes four new labor codes consolidating 29 existing labor laws.
